name: Tell Us About The Stars
description:
You are the last person alive, presumably. Wander the wasteland and think. Literally! There is a dedicated thinking button! Anyways, controls below.

E - Think

Arrow Keys - Move

Enter - Next Piece Of Text

Space Bar/Up Arrow - Jump

Shift - Run

I made this with a friend, all music by me.

I did the art, he did the coding for the most part.
